subtitle.zh: 產品策略 × 數據創新 × AI 實踐
subtitle.en: Product Strategy × Data Innovation × AI Practice

description.zh:
從韌體工程師到產品經理，從創業家到 AI 專案領導者。
20 年職涯，用技術與洞察力創造價值。
description.en:
From firmware engineer to product manager, from entrepreneur to AI project leader.
20 years of career, creating value through technology and insight.

meaning.zh: 整合 AI、電信與數據分析技術，推動 RAN 網路智能化，並開拓前瞻應用領域。
meaning.en: Integrating AI, telecom, and data analytics to advance RAN network intelligence and pioneer innovative applications.

zh: 主導開發 RAN 端 LLM AI 助理，實現自然語言即時操作洞察
實作 Digital Twin 模擬框架研究與原型開發
研發 UWB 定位技術，高精度室內定位應用
設計並實作 DPI，解析核心網路協定，實現端到端電信 KPI 評估
應用 RealMotion 技術於國家安全、詐欺偵測與精準行銷
en: Spearheaded RAN-side LLM AI assistant for real-time operational insight via natural language
Initiated research and prototyping of Digital Twin simulation framework
Researched and developed UWB positioning technology for high-precision indoor positioning applications
Designed and implemented DPI to decode core network protocols and enable end-to-end telecom KPI assessment
Applied RealMotion technology in national security, fraud detection, and marketing targeting

zh.text: Emma 在 AI 和電信領域的結合上有獨到的見解，她的專案執行能力極強。
zh.author: 電信協理

en.text: Emma has unique insights in combining AI with telecommunications, with exceptional project execution capabilities.
en.author: Telecom Associate VP

title.zh: 產品部門主管 - 電信產品設計 數據分析
title.en: Product Department Head - Telecom Product Design & Data Analysis

meaning.zh: 建立電信產品與數據團隊的核心流程，奠定數據驅動決策的基礎架構。
meaning.en: Established core processes for telecom product and data teams, laying the foundation for data-driven decision making.

zh: 主導產品與數據團隊的流程優化與內部工作流設計
開發 4G/5G 基站 KPI 評估模型與部署支援系統
設計用戶體驗、流量分佈、掉話率與頻率規劃評估工具
標準化國際電信專案交付的資料庫文件
en: Led process optimization and internal workflow design for product and data teams
Developed 4G/5G base station KPI evaluation models and deployment support systems
Designed tools to assess user experience, traffic distribution, drop call rates, and frequency planning
Standardized database documentation for international telecom project delivery

meaning.zh: 將 IoT 技術應用於工程安全管理，提升工地人員安全與管理效率。
meaning.en: Applied IoT technology to construction safety management, enhancing worker safety and management efficiency.

zh: 開發隧道施工 IoT 安全管理系統
整合四用氣體偵測、天氣站、溫濕度監控系統
研發 UWB 定位技術，實現高精度人員位置管理
實現即時定位與簽到功能，提升工地安全與人力控管
en: Developed IoT safety management system for tunnel construction
Integrated 4-in-1 gas detection, weather station, and temperature/humidity monitoring
Researched and developed UWB positioning technology for high-precision personnel location management
Enabled real-time positioning and check-in to enhance construction site safety and workforce control

meaning.zh: 從 0 到 1 打造親子活動平台，整合 AR 技術與商業模式，實踐創業家精神與產品全生命週期管理。
meaning.en: Built a family activity platform from scratch, integrating AR technology with business models, embodying entrepreneurial spirit and full product lifecycle management.

zh: 打造 AR 增強的活動平台，累積 40,000+ 用戶、6,000+ 活動
網站累積超過 500 萬瀏覽次數
年營收突破新台幣 1,000 萬元
合作超過 200 個場館；2019 年榮獲台北市智慧生活實驗室獎項
en: Built an AR-enhanced activity platform with 40,000+ users and 6,000+ events
Website accumulated over 5 million views
Annual revenue exceeded NT$10 million
Partnered with over 200 locations; won Taipei Living Lab Award in 2019

zh.text: Emma 是一位充滿熱情和執行力的創業家，她將複雜的技術轉化為有價值的產品。
zh.author: 合作夥伴

en.text: Emma is a passionate and execution-driven entrepreneur who transforms complex technology into valuable products.
en.author: Business Partner

meaning.zh: 帶著兒童職業體驗計畫案進入創新創業家辦公室，進行市場驗證與商業模式探索。
meaning.en: Joined the Innovation and Entrepreneurship Office with a children's career experience project, conducting market validation and business model exploration.

zh: 帶著兒童職業體驗計畫案進入創新創業家辦公室
進行市場可行性分析與商業模式開發
en: Joined Innovation and Entrepreneurship Office with children's career experience project
Conducted market feasibility analysis and business model development

meaning.zh: 創建親子活動媒合平台，整合台灣超過 1,000 個親子吃喝玩樂旅遊資源。
meaning.en: Created a parent-vendor matchmaking platform, integrating over 1,000 parenting dining, entertainment, and travel resources across Taiwan.

zh: 創建親子活動媒合平台
榮獲多項新創獎項，並獲選為 iOS/Android 精選應用程式
整合超過 1,000 個台灣親子吃喝玩樂旅遊資源
en: Created a parent-vendor matchmaking platform
Won multiple startup awards and selected as featured app on iOS/Android
Integrated 1,000+ parenting dining, entertainment, and travel resources in Taiwan

meaning.zh: 領導台灣與北京產品團隊推出新平台，短期內達成月 GMV 150 萬人民幣的成績。
meaning.en: Led product teams in Taiwan and Beijing on new platform release, achieving 1.5M RMB monthly GMV in a short period.

zh: 領導產品團隊推出新平台
達成月 GMV 150 萬人民幣
en: Led product team on new platform release
Achieved 1.5M RMB monthly GMV

title.zh: 資深產品經理 / 部門主管

meaning.zh: 在國際軟體公司磨練產品管理能力，從規劃、設計到市場驗證，打造近億下載量的產品。
meaning.en: Honed product management skills in an international software company, from planning and design to market validation, creating products with nearly 100 million downloads.

zh: 領導 PhotoDirector，於 2013 及 2014 年連續獲得台灣精品金質獎
從無到有發想並落地打造 "玩美相機 YouCam Perfect" 與 "玩美彩妝 YouCam Makeup"，累積近億下載量
領導產品團隊進行設計、分析與路線圖執行
進行內部培訓並代表產品團隊參與外部研討會與技術講座
en: Directed PhotoDirector, received Taiwan Excellence Gold Award in 2013 and 2014
Conceptualized and launched "YouCam Perfect" and "YouCam Makeup" from scratch, achieving nearly 100 million downloads
Led product teams across design, analytics, and roadmap execution
Conducted internal trainings and represented product teams in external workshops and tech talks

meaning.zh: 從韌體工程師轉型為 UX 設計師，開啟使用者體驗設計職涯。
meaning.en: Transitioned from firmware engineer to UX designer, beginning user experience design career.

zh: 設計圖形與多媒體軟體的使用者介面
實踐多種 UX 研究方法：實境訪談、問卷調查、情境調查、使用者經驗測試
從技術背景成功轉型至設計領域
en: Designed user interfaces for graphics and multimedia software
Implemented various UX research methods: field interviews, surveys, contextual inquiry, and user experience testing
Successfully transitioned from technical background to design field

meaning.zh: 職涯起點，從研究所畢業後開始韌體開發工作，在世界級硬體公司累積 ARM 韌體開發經驗，奠定技術基礎。
meaning.en: Career starting point, began firmware development after graduate school, gained ARM firmware development experience at world-class hardware companies, establishing technical foundation.

zh: ASUS (2006-2007): ARM 韌體工程師，開發廣告介面系統
LITEON-IT (2005-2006): ARM 韌體工程師，開發 DVD 播放器 UI 與系統整合
參與系統底層開發與完整產品開發週期
en: ASUS (2006-2007): ARM-based firmware engineer for advertisement interface systems
LITEON-IT (2005-2006): ARM firmware engineer, developed DVD player UI and system integration
Participated in system-level development and complete product development cycle
